text: The process whereby a firm directs its marketing efforts towards a single market by the use of a particular marketing mix is referred to as
explanation:
The Marketing Concept. The marketingconceptis the philosophy that firms should analyze the needs of their customers and then make decisions to satisfy those needs, better than the competition.
Market penetrationis ameasure of the amount of sales or adoption of a product or servicecompared to the total theoretical market for that product or service. In addition, market penetration can also include the activities that are used to increase the market share of a particular product or service.
The purpose of segmentation is theconcentration of marketing energy and force on the subdivision (or the market segment)to gain a competitive advantage within the segment.
consumer orientation.abusiness philosophy of a company which emphasizes the provision of GOODS and SERVICESthat have been specially designed to satisfy the needs of its customers.

text: The buying and selling of goods and services is referred to as
explanation: Tradeis a basic economic concept involving the buying and selling of goods and services, with compensation paid by a buyer to a seller, or the exchange of goods or services between parties.

text: Funds used for paying wages, salaries and payments for raw materials are categorized under
explanation: Circulating capitalincludes intermediate goods and operating expenses, i.e., short-lived items that are used in production and used up in the process of creating other goods or services. e.g Raw materials, work in process, finished goods, and cash at hand that continually flow within an organization.

text: A formal letter to a dealer to enquire details about certain items for sale is referred to as
explanation: Aquotationis a document that offers goods or services at a stated price, under specified conditions: it allows a customer to see details before confirming.

text: The pricing policy that seeks to set prices relatively high in order to attract the wealthy segment of the market is
explanation: Market SkimmingPricing. a pricing approach in which the producer sets a high introductory price to attract buyers with a strong desire for the product and the resources to buy it, and then gradually reduces the price to attract the next and subsequent layers of themarket.

text: In the transportation industry, dead freight is used to describe the

options.A: cost paid for an empty space left in the ship
options.B: charge for each day a performance was delayed
options.C: persons that hire a ship for a specific purpose
options.D: cost of shipping a particular cargo for a specific voyage

explanation: Dead freight is the amount paid by or recoverable from a charterer of a ship for such part of the ship's capacity as the charterer has contracted for but fails to occupy also.  it is simply payment for  the unoccupied space in chartered  ship.

text: When expenses on trading are deducted, the result is the
explanation: Net profit is the actual profit after working expenses not included in the calculation of gross profit have been paid/deducted.

text: Which of the followingis a modern trend in retailing ?
explanation: vending machine: Electronic machine used to disperse a product to a consumer after a certain amount of money has been put into the machine. it is used in retailed shops

text: Which of the following is a traditional medium of communication used to mark festivals?
explanation: Talking drum is one of a set of West African drums, each having a different pitch, which are beaten to transmit a tonal language.

text: One of the functions of the retailer is

options.A: granting credit facilities to close relatives

explanation: After sales serviceplays an importantrolein customer satisfaction and customer retention. It generates loyal customers and increase a brand value. This is one of the services provided by the retailers.

text: One of the factors of determining the volume of production is
explanation:
There are variousfactorswhich affect thevolume of productionwhich includes:
Availability of natural resources.Availability of raw materials.Technology.Availability of capital.Transport facilities.Political conditions.Climate.Efficiency of labour.

text: The minimum lending rate of a bank is a component of its
explanation: the minimum lending rates of a bank depends on its current assets.Current assets hereare balance sheetassetsthat can be converted to cash within one year or less. Accounts that areconsidered current assetsinclude cash and cash equivalents, marketable securities, accounts receivable, inventory, prepaid expenses, and other liquidassets.

text: Which of the following is the best method for computing working capital
explanation: The networking capitalformula is calculated by subtracting the current liabilities from the current assets.

text: One of the functions of the Nigerian Ports Authority is that it

options.A: gives preferential treatment to Nigerian investors
options.C: encourages the growth of infant industries
options.D: provides warehosing facilities at the docks

explanation: providing and operating necessary facilities inportsand maintaining, improving and regulating the use of theports

text: An ancillary to trade which promotes socio - cultural development all over the world is
explanation: Tourismmeans people traveling for fun. It includes activities such as sightseeing and camping. People who travel for fun arecalled"tourists". Places where manytouristsstay arecalled"resorts". Places that people go to fortourismarecalled touristdestinations. Tourism promotes socio-cultural development

text: An association that acts as a watchdog between enterpreneurs and government to protect trade from any unfavourable laws is said to be a
explanation: AChamber of Commerce(also referred to in some circles as a board of trade) is a form of business network, e.g., a local organization of businesses whose goal is to further the interests of businesses. Business owners in towns and cities form these local societies to advocate on behalf of the business community.

text: Labour as an input in production can be motivated by
explanation: Employeemotivationis the level of energy, commitment, and creativity that a company'sworkersbring to their jobs. If theremunerationis directly related with work performance,employeewill work hard. It is the reason that most of managers useremunerationtomotivate employees

text: Discharging certian duties by an organization to the public to gain high patronage is a concern of ?
explanation: Social responsibilityis an ethical framework and suggests that an entity, be it an organization or individual, has an obligation to act for the benefit of society at large.

text: Complying with the rules relating to the conduct of business activities in a country is an aspect of
explanation: Legal environment Refers to the terms/conditions of the place where you are conducting business. it outlines various laws that regulatebusinesses, their intended purpose in thebusiness, and how they affect thebusiness.

text: Which of the following is a legal tender?
explanation: bank note is a piece of paper money, constituting a central bank's promissory note to pay a stated sum to the bearer on demand.

text: Which of the following is NOT backed by gold but by government securites?
explanation: Fiduciarynote. This term refers to that portion of anoteissue, whether that of a Government or of a bank, which is not protected by a specific backing of metal or coin or assets capable of being converted into coin or bullion on demand.

text: Where a manufacturer doesn't collects money from wholesalers in exchange for goods produced is referred to as
explanation: Trade creditis thecreditextended to you by suppliers who let you buy now and pay later. Any time you take delivery of materials, equipment or other valuables without paying cash on the spot, you're usingtrade credit.

text: Quantity discount is offerred mainly to persuade the buyer to
explanation: Aquantity discountis often offered by sellers to entice buyers to purchase in largerquantities.

text: The placement of workers based on their qualifications can be categorized under
explanation: Skilled laborrefers tolaborthat requires workers who have specialized training or a learnedskill-set to perform the work. These workers can be either blue-collar or white-collar workers, with varied levels of training or education.

text: A group of computers that exchange data is referred to as
explanation: A network, in computing, is a group of two or more devices that can communicate.

text: The form of credit sales common to low income groups is
explanation: Book-me-down is a type of credit purchase whereby a customer will purchase goods on credit and write down their names. It is common among low income earners in underdeveloped countries

text: Petrol voucher is an example of a
explanation: Partialpayment refers to the offering of a payment by check for less than the full amount claimed by the creditor.

text: One of the major reasons for merger is to

options.A: reduce the number of unskilled manpower
options.B: increase the number of skilled manpower

explanation: Synergy: One of themain reasonswhy companiesmergeor acquire other companies is to create a synergy. Synergy is the concept that, the value of the combined companies will be greater than the joint value of the two individual companies. This will inturn prevent liquidation or folding up of a company

text: A Major funtion of commerce is to
explanation: Commerceprovides the advantages of specialisation. It helps to better satisfy human wants by collecting and distributing goods.Commerceprovides the necessary link between the producers and consumers of goods.
